title: Satin Creditcare Network raises Rs 332 crore from Dutch development bank
description: Satin's assets under management grew 34% year-on-year to Rs 10593 crore as of the end of March. The lender is aiming to grow its portfolio by 25% in the current fiscal. The lender disbursed Rs 9,691 crore during FY24, the highest in a year so far, while it added 6.3 lakh borrowers taking the total count to 34.7 lakh.
